description:
The interview was recorded on June 6, 2004 with Khalīl Bayyūk, male, born in al-Ramlah, Palestine and resides in al-Ḥamrā, Lebanon. 

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع خليل بيوك في 6 حزيران يونيو عام 2004، ذكر، ولد في الرملة، فلسطين ويقيم في الحمرا، لبنان.
contents: Education and childhood memories. (@ 0:09)||Social and community life . (@ 13:29)||Political conditions and Expulsion from al-Ramlah. (@ 28:6)

description:
The interview was recorded on August 17, 2011 with Renée Kuttih, female, born in 1925 in al-Ramlah, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع رينيه كته في 17 آب أغسطس عام 2011، أنثى، ولدت عام 1925 في الرملة، فلسطين.
contents: Socio-economic Life in the city. (@ 0:00)||Pre-marital Life,Village Traditions and Schooling . (@ 14:39)||Engagement, Marriage and Family Life . (@ 40:45)||Wedding celebration and honeymoon in Europe. (@ 63:16)||Political turmoil and Displacement (@ 79:44)||Relations with the Jews. (@ 87:43)||Land Ownership and attacks. (@ 98:10)||Expulsion from Palestine and life in exile . (@ 104:48)||Return to Palestine and life in pre-Nakba Palestine. (@ 116:34)||Childhood and other Personal Memories. (@ 129:3)
